Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Dagger
Weapon.Description: A blade that slices the air, its origins traced back to the ancient assassins of the Ethereal Plane.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Grants invisibility for 5 seconds after a critical hit.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the dagger cuts through, you vanish from sight, leaving your foes bewildered.

Weapon.Name: Starfire Wand
Weapon.Description: A mystical wand, forged from a rare crystalline material found only in the core of fallen stars.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Launches a burst of starlight, dealing area damage.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The air crackles with energy as a burst of starlight erupts from the wand.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Ancients
Weapon.Description: This ancient tome is bound by the skins of mythical creatures and imbued with the souls of past mages.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Summons an ancestral spirit to fight alongside you.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The tome glows brightly, and an ethereal figure appears, ready to battle at your side.
